title: Queso Fundido
ingredients: 8 ounces chorizo, cooked and well drained
Tortilla chips or fresh corn tortillas
instructions: Put the cooked, drained chorizo in an oven-proof casserole dish.  Grate the cheese over the top and place in an hot oven.  Heat until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve with either tortilla chips or warm, fresh corn tortillas.
remarks: Cacique‚Äù (Chief) is a nationally distributed brand of Mexican cheeses available that one can look for.
yield: Serves 4 to 6 persons as an appetizer.
source: Chorizo Challenge, Food Section of the San Antonio Express News,  (recipe provided by Cacique ).
